title: Building and Monitoring AI Agents with Helicone: A Step-by-Step Guide (Part 2)
title1: Building and Monitoring AI Agents (Part 2): A Step-by-Step Guide
title2: Building and Monitoring AI Agents with Helicone (Part 2): A Step-by-Step Guide
description: Building reliable AI agents requires robust monitoring and observability. In the second part of our tutorial, we'll fix our buggy financial research assistant and optimize its performance using Helicone's agentic AI observability features.
author: Yusuf Ishola
